function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large emission of SARS-CoV-2 gene equivalents into receiving water bodies from wastewater treatment plants (WWTPs).","Impact":"Risk of contamination of crucial water resources for drinking water production, cooling water abstraction, public swimming, irrigation, recreation, and natural habitats.","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced wastewater treatment technologies and improved water quality monitoring.","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies such as UV disinfection, ozone treatment, and membrane filtration.","People":"General public, water resource managers, and environmental authorities.","Owner":"Water treatment facilities, environmental organizations, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Variability in viral shedding from infected persons and uncertainty in viral gene copies detected in human excreta.","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately estimating the viral load in wastewater and potential exposure risks.","Mitigation":"Development of robust dose-response models for SARS-CoV-2 and improved monitoring of viral shedding in wastewater.","Technologies":"Development of dose-response models for SARS-CoV-2 and advanced wastewater testing methods.","People":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and wastewater treatment experts.","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and wastewater treatment facilities."}]}
